titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that the President should exercise the line-item veto without awaiting the enactment of additional authorization for the purpose of obtaining a judicial determination of its constitutionality.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

bill.summary: 7/26/1994--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the Senate that the President should exercise the line-item veto without waiting for enactment of additional authorization for the purpose of obtaining a judicial determination of its constitutionality.
